users.description: I'm a huge fan of pop punk band such as Blink-182, Green Day, and Sum 41. Some of my favorite bands include Yellowcard and Breaking Benjamin. I love to jam with other fellow musicians. I've played the piano for well over 10 years, but I also play guitar. If someone is looking for a violinist, I might be able to bust out my old violin as well. Looking for a band to jam with.

My name is Alban, and I've been rocking out with fellow musicians for the past 30 years. The drums are by far my favorite instrument to play, and I've recently picked up the flute in the last 10 years to add to my arsenal. You may not think it is an instrument suited for rock, but wait until you hear it before completely writing it off.

Hello everyone, my name is Sally Strong and I'm looking for a serious band to go around and play at local jazz venues. It doesn't matter what the size of the band is, as I've been playing in Jazz Duo's for many years. If you're interested in a saxophone or percussion player, email me with details to your band.

I love to jam! My name is Bryan, but everybody calls me Bry for short. The piano and trumpet are my go-to instruments, but I can pick up new ones in a matter of weeks. I'm a big jazz fan, and would love to meet up wtih some local musicians to just jam on the weekends or whenever anybody is free.

Hi all, I am Melissa and I'm a passionate bass player who excels in backup vocals. Some of my favorite bands include Van Halen, Weezer, and Angels and Airwaves. I am not looking for anything serious, so if you have a local, casual band, feel free to contact me!

What's up! My name is Jane Anderson, and I am a huge fan of rock and roll. I play a huge selectin of instruments, and I believe I would be an excellent addition to any local band. I am looking for any seriousness level, from just jamming to actually going on gigs.

My name is Julius Yared, and I am an avid country fan. I only play the violin, but I can easily sing while playing. Music has been a huge influence on my life, and now that I have a steady job and extra time, I would love to get together with some local musicians and jam together.

Yo! My name is Victor Janez, and I am a huge country buff. I have played the cello for most of my life, including all throughout high school and in a small symphony at my college. Recently, I have started playing the drums. If anybody is looking for a cello player for a country band, hit me up.
